notes: Rails callable Python MVP for PDF OCR analysis. Stateless CLI that outputs JSON to stdout. OCR is stubbed.

files.summary: CLI entry point. Accepts --pdf argument, calls OCR stub, parses results, normalizes items, outputs JSON to stdout.
OCR stub module returning dummy Japanese invoice text for testing PDF analysis logic.
Parser module extracting vendor_name, dates, totals, and line items from OCR text.
Item name normalizer applying rules (wiper variations â†’ wiper_blade, labor detection).
Python dependencies (minimal, likely just argparse built-in).
Usage instructions and JSON schema documentation for Rails integration.
